Package game.graphics

Interface Summary
WorldInterface Interface used by game graphics for communicate with the game logic
 

Class Summary
Bullet A graphical bullet
The graphical (physics) representation of a bullet
CollisionHandler CollisionHandler
Class that manage objects's collisions
Environment Enviroment class
manage items and objects
ExplosionFactory ExplosionFactory
GameAnimationController Class CustomAnimationController
An custom animation controller to easily run animations with a JointController
GraphicalAmmoPackage A graphical ammo package
The graphical (physics) representation of ammo package
GraphicalCharacter Graphical Character
The graphical representation of the character
GraphicalEnemy Graphical enemy
GraphicalEnergyPackage Graphical energy package
The graphical (physics) representation of energy package
GraphicalPlayer Class PhysicsPlayer
Represents a graphical player viewed in third person view
GraphicalWorld Class GraphicalWorld
The main graphics class which contains all the graphical objects and characters
Scene Class Scene used to read the xml file exported from FreeWorld3d
Needed library: JDOM
 

Enum Summary
GameAnimationController.Animation A utility enum for easily set most used animations
